abstract: Margaret Pomeranz interviews Fred Schepisi in the wake of the success of his film 'Roxanne'.
description: In this interview filmed as part of SBS's 'The Movie Show', Margaret Pomeranz interviews film director Fred Schepisi on the success of his film 'Roxanne'. They discuss the collaborative process of filmmaking, selecting the right crew and working with comedian/actor Steve Martin.
